name: Gold Harvest
description:
The Earth's gold supply has been completely wiped out. No more mining operations exist, yet gold is still needed. You are a Gold Harvester, search the graves for gold. Watch out for Ghosts and their police force.


CONTROLS

Movement: W, A, S, D

Dig: Space Bar

Look Around: Move Mouse

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Game Uses Text Font Made By:

Daniel Linnssen - https://managore.itch.io/m5x7
